meanings.definition: To certify or attest to the authenticity of a document by a notary public.
meanings.sent1: I need to get my document notarized before I can submit it.
meanings.sent2: The contract was notarized by the official notary public.
meanings.sent3: The notary public notarized the paper with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: Her signature notarized the agreement, making it official.
meanings.sent5: Notarizing the will ensured its legal validity.

meanings.definition: Having been officially witnessed and signed by a notary public.
meanings.sent1: The notarized document is now ready for filing.
meanings.sent2: She presented the notarized papers to the court.
meanings.sent3: The notarized certificate had a fancy gold seal.
meanings.sent4: The notarized deed was proof of ownership.
meanings.sent5: The notarized contract was binding and secure.
